userForm.bceidEmail: Email address associated with the BCeID user account
userForm.activeLabel: Active, user can login to LCFS portal
userForm.inactiveLabel: Inactive, user cannot login to LCFS portal
userForm.administrator: can add/edit IDIR users and assign roles and add/edit organizations, BCeID users and assign roles.
userForm.analyst: can make recommendations on transfers, transactions and compliance reports, manage file submissions and add/edit fuel codes.
userForm.compliance_manager: can make recommendations on compliance reports.
userForm.director: can assess compliance reports and approve transactions.
userForm.manage_users: can add/edit BCeID users and assign roles.
userForm.transfer: can create/save transfers and submit files.
userForm.compliance_reporting: can create/save compliance reports and submit files.
userForm.signing_authority: can sign and submit compliance reports to government and transfers to trade partners/government.
userForm.read_only: can view transactions, compliance reports and files.
